abstract: The billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn wants to raise his stake in Lions Gate Entertainment to nearly 30 percent and he is willing to spend about $79 million to do so.
snippet: The billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn wants to raise his stake in Lions Gate Entertainment to nearly 30 percent and he is willing to spend about $79 million to do so.
lead_paragraph: The billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn wants to raise his stake in Lions Gate Entertainment to nearly 30 percent and he is willing to spend about $79 million to do so.

headline.main: Icahn Wants to Raise Lions Gate Stake to Nearly 30%
